QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when web_acl_arn is not null then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when web_acl_arn is not null then title || ' associated with WAF web ACL.'
    else title || ' not associated with WAF web ACL.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_api_gateway_stage;
